description_html: Embracing the artistic nature of brush strokes on pottery, Glaze paints an interesting textile. The durable, jacquard design includes a carefully arranged gradation of color in a 19-plus-inch vertical repeat and is constructed with Sunbrella® Contract solution-dyed acrylic and produced with proprietary Sunbrella yarns. Glaze is offered in an inspiring palette of eight colorways and joins Brentano's Green label with an ACT Facts Silver third party certification. The indoor/outdoor 54" upholstery fabric also offers stain resistance and bleach cleanability for a wide range of indoor and outdoor applications.
